t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Amazon named among the most innovative, trusted brands by Axios Harris Poll and 3 other recent polls
s: May 25, 2023 - The rankings are based on net trust—the share of consumers that trust a brand, minus the share that say they distrust a brand. This ranking was more robust this year with the inclusion of more industries. Amazon was the No. 3 most trusted brand in the U.S. and No. 1 among tech brands.

t: We Did the Scrolling for You, and These Are the Best Clothing Brands on Amazon
s: January 5, 2024 - Who among us doesn't love the ease of shopping on Amazon? Being able to add everything from cute new home decor to beauty essentials and sex toys all to one cart with two-day Prime shipping? Yes, please! More than anything, though, we love the sales and deals that the retailer is known for.
